==Chinese==

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|爻|肉|alt2=⺼|t2=meat|ls=psc|c1=p|c2=s}} – meat dishes. The character 爻 also has meaning of “cut, divided, sliced”, so connotations of “sliced meat, prepared meat”.

Current form resembles {{Han compound|乂|有}} – the lower 乂 of 爻 has moved to the side and down.

===Etymology 1===
<div style="float:right;">
{{wikipedia|lang=ja}}
[[File:Beer_and_edamame_(boild_green_soybeans).jpg|thumb|250px|{{lang|ja|肴}}, {{l|ja|魚}} (''sakana''): a [[side dish]] served with [[alcoholic]] [[beverage]]s.]]
</div>
{{ja-kanjitab|さかな|yomi=k}}
Compound of {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=さかな}} elements {{compound|lang=ja|sort=さかな|酒|tr1=saka|t1=sake, rice wine|pos1=old combining form of modern ''sake'' reading|菜|tr2=na|t2=side dish}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref><ref name="DJS">{{R:Daijisen}}</ref> Likely source of {{cog|ryu|さかな|tr=sakana}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|さかな|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR,NHK}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{ja-l|魚}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|さかな}}

# [[fish]]
# a [[side dish]] served with [[alcoholic]] [[beverage]]s: not necessarily [[fish]], may be a [[vegetable]] or other [[meat]]
# [[entertainment]] at a [[drinking]] [[party]]

=====Usage notes=====
The {{m|en|fish}} sense is more commonly spelled {{ja-l|魚}}.

=====Idioms=====
{{der-top|Idioms}}
* {{ja-r|肴にする|さかな に する}}: to [[belittle]] someone, to [[make fun of]] someone
{{der-bottom}}

===Etymology 2===
<div style="float:right;">
[[File:GrilledCongridae.jpg|thumb|250px|{{lang|ja|肴}} (''na''): fish as a [[side dish]].]]
</div>
{{ja-kanjitab|な|yomi=kun}}
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=な}}. Also spelled variously in kanji in modern Japanese as {{m|ja|肴|pos=for meat or fish}}, {{m|ja|菜|pos=for vegetables}}, {{m|ja|魚|pos=for fish}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

This reading appears to be obsolete in modern Japanese.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=kun|な}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|な}}

# a [[side dish]], be it [[meat]] or [[fish]] or [[greens]]

=====Derived terms=====
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|肴|さかな}} {{qualifier|see above}}
* {{ja-r|魚|さかな}} {{qualifier|see above}}
{{der-bottom}}
